title: Job Openings at Cold Slab Ice Creamery
content:
Cold Slab Ice Creamery is an ice cream brand that solely specialises in the production and selling of different ice cream flavours with chocolate toppings and pizza to customers.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Pizza Maker / Sharwarma Maker

Job Location: Surelere, Lagos
Employment Type: Contract

Description


	Looking for an experienced pizza/shawarma maker with at least three years relevant experience.


Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 3 - 5 years of relevant work experience.


Salary
N60,000 - N80,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume / CV to: coldslabicecreamery@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Ice Cream Server

Job Location: Surelere, Lagos
Employment Type: Contract

Requirements


	Looking for a cashier to work in an ice cream and pizza shop.
	The successful applicant would have relevant experience I'm customer service.
	Have interpersonal skills and ability to communicate with costomers effectively while upselling our products.
	Must be hard working and very committed to growing the business brand.


Salary
N50,000 - 70,000 Monthly. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume / CV to: coldslabicecreamery@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Baker

Job Location: Surelere, Lagos
Employment Type: Contract

Requirements


	Looking for an experienced Baker with a minimum of three years of experience.


Salary
N50,000 - N80,000 / month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: coldslabicecreamery@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Safety, Health, Environment, and Quality (SHEQ) Supervisor Job at De Talents




        
    

        
        De Talents is currently recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Safety, Health, Environment, and Quality (SHEQ) Supervisor
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage, develop, implement and exercise SHEQ activities across all sites;
	Oversea, control and maintain inventory of materials/records related to SHEQ activities;
	Monitor and review workplace practices to ensure compliance with SHEQ legislation, SOP’s/policy and provide recommendations for improvement to management;
	Manage Safety functions in line with business policies, procedures and standards.
	Ensure conformance with safety and OHSAS 14001 & 18001:2007 standards and requirements on the base.
	Identify system problems, investigate and recommend solutions.
	Participate in Safety Incident Investigations and Risk assessments
	Motivate and oversee the implementation of Safety improvement initiatives.
	Coordinate and attend regular Safety meetings.
	Carry out regular site inspections to check policies and procedures are being properly implemented
	Ensure equipment/infrastructure is maintained that ensures optimum performance;
	Ensure all non-conformances are correctly reported immediately in a formal report including supporting documentation to minimize the company’s risk;
	Undertake SHEQ inspections of all areas to ensure compliance with legal requirements;
	Recommending, designing and facilitating awareness training as appropriate;
	Supervise and monitor the distribution of PPEs and other SHEQ equipment and assets;
	Ensure equipment is maintained and certificated in cooperation with other business units;
	Produce reports and correspondence utilizing various business software;
	Gathers SHEQ and records statistical information for reporting purposes;
	Conducting regular on-job SHEQ training as directed by Management;


Requirements
Education and Qualifications:


	Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering, or Science in Oil and Gas related discipline
	HSE Certifications E.g. Level 3 Certification in NEBOSH National General Certificate IOSH Working Safely, First Aid, Safety Auditing, Instructor and Train-the-Trainer, basic fire-fighting,
	Working knowledge of Environmental Discharges, Incident reporting system, Incident Investigation, HSE Auditing, JSA etc.


Experience:


	Minimum of 5 years in HSE officer role and working knowledge of HSE Management System in a multi-national or Oil and Gas industry
	Experience of dealing with difficult situations in a diplomatic and professional manner;
	Track record of working with HSE department in developing and implementing HSE policies and systems.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: dreamjobprof@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	Only qualified applicants will be contacted.
	Work experience should include start month & year - End month and year.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Public Relations (PR) Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ekitii
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Communications / Corporate Affairs

Job Purpose


	The Public Relations Officer is responsible for managing the organization&rsquo;s brand image, media relations, external communications, and public engagement.
	The role ensures positive perception of the organization by maintaining strong relationships with media houses, stakeholders, and the public, while communicating key messages clearly and effectively.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement strategic PR and communication plans to enhance corporate visibility.
	Draft, edit, and distribute press releases, speeches, newsletters, and articles.
	Manage media relations, respond to press inquiries, and coordinate interviews and public statements.
	Plan, organize, and manage corporate events, community outreach, and brand promotional activities.
	Monitor media coverage and track public sentiment to inform communication strategy.
	Create engaging content for social media platforms, website, and publications.
	Ensure brand messaging is consistent across all internal and external communication channels.
	Maintain a database of media contacts, stakeholders, and public partners.
	Collaborate with internal teams to support campaigns, announcements, and organizational initiatives.
	Represent the organization at public engagements, meetings, and media sessions when required.


Qualifications &amp; Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Mass Communication, Public Relations, Journalism, Marketing, or a related field.
	2&ndash;5 years of proven experience in public relations, marketing communications, or media coordination.
	Strong writing, editing, and content development skills.
	Confident public speaking and presentation skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office, social media management tools, and digital communication platforms.


Salary
Negotiable (Based on Experience).

Method of Application&nbsp;
